sentence: The highlights of the trip was the NY eve red carpet event the great restsurants on site Corsair and Bourbon Steak the spa and gym and the adult pool
The Cascata pool is for adults and is very peaceful
She introduced us to a Miami Vice which was the perfect way to cool off at the pool
The Laguna pool and lazy river are an excellent way to spend the day relaxing
Sabrina Perez went out of her way to make sure everything was perfect for us all day while we were lounging at the pool
Wonderful for a spa and pool day with the girls
Ben was working as the pool attendant and was extremely pleasant and attentive
We had front row pool chairs which were prime for the sun and access to get right in the pool
The pool is great and the pool bar makes delicious drinks
Good service by the pool was totally lacking
Does have beach access Free shuttle to beach Both pools
I knew beforehand the big pool would be closed because there was construction being done
Lovely bedrooms but because the large pool is still under construction the adult only pool is very busy
The pool area was packed but he was able to find us three lounge chairs near the water slides which was perfect
I spent most of my time by the pool which does not allow children which was a pleasant surprise
Highly recommend a massage or facial and after sit by the pool and have a bite to eat

The nice new lounge in the lobby was filled nicely dressed civilized adults trying to enjoy a cocktail mixed with people still running a muck in an unsupervised pool running through the bar in dripping wet in bathing suits ordering juice at the bar for their children who are still awake at 10 pm
Big kudos and thanks to the team that take care of me and my Family at the pool Tidal Cove Kids Pool Erica Kristen and all the team that take care of the lounges and Cabanas
The security team the pool concierge Catalina from the giftshop
Amazing pools and water park
When I tried to relax at the pool it turns out they had a party to cater and the path for all the supplies dishes and glasses etc
They make you feel safe and enjoy the pool and the sun
Our rooms with our teens were adjoining and right next to the pool
The food at the pool area is nice 710 and okay priced not cheap but I have been to other hotels where it is far more expensive
We especially enjoyed the Lazy River lagoon pool and hot tubs
Pools are great and the waterpark was a lot of fun
